rows.label: tlk70000141_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone is abuzz with tales of
your derring-do.

rows.label: tlk70000141_02_msg0002
rows.name:
This is exactly what the people need
at a time like this. A beacon of hope.

rows.label: tlk70000141_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Power alone is not enough to prevail.
Without kindness and goodness there
can be no victory.

rows.label: tlk70000141_02_msg0004
rows.name:
You've found a superlative Driver, Shin.
Not to mention an impressive group
of friends
